name: Cross Word Puzzles: Easy Find
description:
-- Cross Word Puzzles --

Search and swipe over the letter tiles to reveal the hidden words!
Find the 10 hidden words to solve the puzzle.

Need help? Use clues!
Improve your score to unlock more clues!

Too hard or too easy? You can change the difficulty:

・ number of incomplete words / puzzle: 0, 1, 3, 5, 7 or 9
・ number of missing letters / incomplete word: 1, 2 or 3
・ number of clue letters: 1, 2 or all

Features:

・ 300 word puzzles available
・ New game mode: Spell 100! Try to find 100 words in each puzzle!
・ Dictionary : you can view the definitions at the end of a game
・ Universal app
・ GameCenter: compete on 2 leaderboards and try to earn 10 achievements
・ iCloud Sync: sync your game progress across multiple devices

Are you left-handed? Playing on iPad? You can flip the game screen for a better experience.
